text:
# GAME STARTS
<ROUND i="1 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT> Let's all contribute 20 coins to maximize our shared pot! </CHAT>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
PINGUIN: Let's all contribute 20 coins to maximize our shared pot!
HORSE: Let's work together and all contribute 20 coins to maximize our payoff!
OWL: Let's all contribute 20 coins to maximize our payoffs!
MONKEY: Let's all contribute to the pot for a better payout!
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> 20 coins start in the shared pot. Choose how many coins to take for yourself (your contribution is what remains). Valid choice: either 0 or 20. The pot multiplier is 1.6×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 20 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="40" multiplied_contrib="64.0" active_players="4" redistributed_each="16.0"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> HORSE=20,OWL=0,MONKEY=0 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<MECHANISM_INFO> It will cost you, per unit, 3 coins to give a reward of 4.0 coins. Choose whom to reward and by how many units. </MECHANISM_INFO>
<REWARD> {"HORSE":2} </REWARD>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"PINGUIN (YOU)":{"coins_spent_on_reward":6,"coins_rewarded_to_you":20,"payoff":30},"HORSE":{"coins_spent_on_reward":12,"coins_rewarded_to_them":12,"payoff":16},"OWL":{"coins_spent_on_reward":0,"coins_rewarded_to_them":0,"payoff":36},"MONKEY":{"coins_spent_on_reward":6,"coins_rewarded_to_them":0,"payoff":30}}'/>
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="2 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT> I'd appreciate more teamwork this round. Let's all contribute 20 coins! </CHAT>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
PINGUIN: I'd appreciate more teamwork this round. Let's all contribute 20 coins!
HORSE: It only works if we all contribute. Let's try again and everyone put in 20 this time!
OWL: Let's aim for fairness and contribute for mutual benefit.
MONKEY: Great start, thanks for contributing! Let's keep up the teamwork!
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> 20 coins start in the shared pot. Choose how many coins to take for yourself (your contribution is what remains). Valid choice: either 0 or 20. The pot multiplier is 1.6×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 20 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="60" multiplied_contrib="96.0" active_players="4" redistributed_each="24.0"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> HORSE=20,OWL=20,MONKEY=0 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<MECHANISM_INFO> It will cost you, per unit, 3 coins to give a reward of 4.0 coins. Choose whom to reward and by how many units. </MECHANISM_INFO>
<REWARD> {"HORSE":2,"OWL":2} </REWARD>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"PINGUIN (YOU)":{"coins_spent_on_reward":12,"coins_rewarded_to_you":24,"payoff":36},"HORSE":{"coins_spent_on_reward":24,"coins_rewarded_to_them":16,"payoff":16},"OWL":{"coins_spent_on_reward":6,"coins_rewarded_to_them":28,"payoff":46},"MONKEY":{"coins_spent_on_reward":9,"coins_rewarded_to_them":0,"payoff":35}}'/>
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="3 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT> Great job everyone! Let's keep it up by all contributing 20 again. </CHAT>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
PINGUIN: Great job everyone! Let's keep it up by all contributing 20 again.
HORSE: Remember, rewards are based on contributions. Let's all put in 20 for our mutual gain!
OWL: Let's keep up the teamwork and contribute equally for the best results!
MONKEY: Thanks for everyone's contribution last round! Let's continue working together.
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> 20 coins start in the shared pot. Choose how many coins to take for yourself (your contribution is what remains). Valid choice: either 0 or 20. The pot multiplier is 1.6×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 20 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="80" multiplied_contrib="128.0" active_players="4" redistributed_each="32.0"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> HORSE=20,OWL=20,MONKEY=20 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<MECHANISM_INFO> It will cost you, per unit, 3 coins to give a reward of 4.0 coins. Choose whom to reward and by how many units. </MECHANISM_INFO>
<REWARD> {"HORSE":2,"OWL":2,"MONKEY":2} </REWARD>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"PINGUIN (YOU)":{"coins_spent_on_reward":18,"coins_rewarded_to_you":20,"payoff":34},"HORSE":{"coins_spent_on_reward":36,"coins_rewarded_to_them":12,"payoff":8},"OWL":{"coins_spent_on_reward":9,"coins_rewarded_to_them":24,"payoff":47},"MONKEY":{"coins_spent_on_reward":0,"coins_rewarded_to_them":28,"payoff":60}}'/>
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="4 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT> Let's keep contributing 20 coins each to maximize our shared rewards! </CHAT>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
PINGUIN: Let's keep contributing 20 coins each to maximize our shared rewards!
HORSE: Great teamwork last round! Let's keep contributing 20 each to maximize our shared pot!
OWL: We've been doing great! Let's contribute 20 again and reward fairly to keep the momentum.
MONKEY: Thank you all for contributing last round! Let's aim for equal contributions to keep up the momentum.
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> 20 coins start in the shared pot. Choose how many coins to take for yourself (your contribution is what remains). Valid choice: either 0 or 20. The pot multiplier is 1.6×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 20 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="80" multiplied_contrib="128.0" active_players="4" redistributed_each="32.0"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> HORSE=20,OWL=20,MONKEY=20 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<MECHANISM_INFO> It will cost you, per unit, 3 coins to give a reward of 4.0 coins. Choose whom to reward and by how many units. </MECHANISM_INFO>
<REWARD> {"HORSE":2,"OWL":2,"MONKEY":2} </REWARD>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"PINGUIN (YOU)":{"coins_spent_on_reward":18,"coins_rewarded_to_you":20,"payoff":34},"HORSE":{"coins_spent_on_reward":36,"coins_rewarded_to_them":12,"payoff":8},"OWL":{"coins_spent_on_reward":9,"coins_rewarded_to_them":24,"payoff":47},"MONKEY":{"coins_spent_on_reward":0,"coins_rewarded_to_them":28,"payoff":60}}'/>
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="5 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT> We've done well by contributing equally. Let's continue the trend for maximum benefit! </CHAT>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
PINGUIN: We've done well by contributing equally. Let's continue the trend for maximum benefit!
HORSE: We've done well when everyone contributes 20. Let's keep it that way for the best results!
OWL: We've been seeing great results with everyone contributing 20 coins. Let's keep it up for this round too!
MONKEY: We've done well so far! Let's keep contributing 20 each for the best results.
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> 20 coins start in the shared pot. Choose how many coins to take for yourself (your contribution is what remains). Valid choice: either 0 or 20. The pot multiplier is 1.6×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 20 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="80" multiplied_contrib="128.0" active_players="4" redistributed_each="32.0"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> HORSE=20,OWL=20,MONKEY=20 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<MECHANISM_INFO> It will cost you, per unit, 3 coins to give a reward of 4.0 coins. Choose whom to reward and by how many units. </MECHANISM_INFO>
<REWARD> {"HORSE":2,"OWL":2,"MONKEY":2} </REWARD>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"PINGUIN (YOU)":{"coins_spent_on_reward":18,"coins_rewarded_to_you":20,"payoff":34},"HORSE":{"coins_spent_on_reward":36,"coins_rewarded_to_them":12,"payoff":8},"OWL":{"coins_spent_on_reward":9,"coins_rewarded_to_them":24,"payoff":47},"MONKEY":{"coins_spent_on_reward":0,"coins_rewarded_to_them":28,"payoff":60}}'/>
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="6 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT> It's the final round! Let's finish strong by all contributing 20 coins! Great job, everyone! </CHAT>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
PINGUIN: It's the final round! Let's finish strong by all contributing 20 coins! Great job, everyone!
HORSE: Let's finish strong! Everyone contributes 20 again for the best outcome!
OWL: We've done well by maintaining equal contributions. Let's finish strong by contributing 20 one last time for the best payoff!
MONKEY: We've been consistent and successful. Let's finish strong by each contributing 20 again!
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> 20 coins start in the shared pot. Choose how many coins to take for yourself (your contribution is what remains). Valid choice: either 0 or 20. The pot multiplier is 1.6×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 20 </CONTRIB>

</ROUND>
